alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 9:14AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 945 AM EST... At 914 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chiefland to near Williston. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Archer, Cross Creek, Micanopy, McIntosh and Flemington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for northern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion
